message: Changed the rating system so that they're no longer associated with comments.
Added a rating count to the rating display.
Linked to song edit page on song page.
Linked to album edit page on album page.
Added edit option to album page and song page.
Added 'add song' button to album page.
Upon song creation, you are now linked back to album page, where you can then easily add a new song again.
Improved the appearance of the songs in song lists. They now display as a table.
